language.title: Language
language.description: Choose how MessageDrop picks your language.

location.title: Device location on startup
location.description: Use your current position as soon as the app launches.
location.note: By enabling, you allow the app to access your device location right after launch. The location helps surface nearby content and is not continuously tracked. Processing prefers on-device handling; minimal data may be sent to our service only to deliver the feature you request (e.g., local weather). You can revoke permission anytime.

storage.title: Persistent storage
storage.description: Keeps local data safe from automatic cleanup.
storage.note: When available, we ask the browser to keep IndexedDB data permanently. Ideal for offline usage or large message archives.
storage.warning: Persistent storage could not be granted by the browser.
storage.quotaWarning: Storage almost full ({{ percent }}% used: {{ used }} of {{ total }}).
storage.confirmDisable: Disabling may allow the browser to prune stored data. Do you really want to continue?

usageProtection.title: Usage protection
usageProtection.description: Set daily limits and time windows for app usage.
usageProtection.note: Use this feature to reduce screen time. In self mode one extra extension is allowed per day. In parental mode a PIN is required once the limit is reached.
usageProtection.pinSet: A parental PIN is already configured.
usageProtection.pinPending: New parent PIN captured. Save with Apply.
usageProtection.pinMissing: Set a parental PIN before saving.
usageProtection.unlockRequired: Please enter the parent PIN first to edit usage protection settings.
usageProtection.pinCurrentMismatch: Current parent PIN is not correct.
usageProtection.pinMismatch: PIN and confirmation do not match.
usageProtection.pinHashFailed: PIN could not be secured. Please try again.

backup.title: Backup reminder
backup.description: Ask before closing if new data should be backed up.
backup.note: When enabled, you will be prompted before leaving the app if there are new changes.

logging.title: Diagnostics
logging.description: Allow anonymous error reports to improve stability.
logging.note: Only technical metadata is sent. You can change this anytime.
